item.description:
Roger Turcotte

Top 6 Negotiating Secrets

Join national real estate instructor Roger Turcotte as he discusses the critical things that you can do to achieve greater success at the negotiating table. Whether you are about to do your first transaction, or have done hundreds of deals, this program will enhance your confidence as a negotiator. This fast paced program will help you to:

•Understand the risk and reward continuum
•Measure relationship and substance
•Manage the negotiating event
•Stay focused on the target
•Handle the tough situations
•Overcome the fear of saying yes

Roger Turcotte is the author of the Coldwell Banker Certified Negotiating Specialist course as well as the creator of Negotiating Real Estate – Stop Stressing and Start Winning. He has helped thousands of individuals around the country learn how to overcome the negotiating pitfalls that kill so many transactions.
Don’t miss this one!
NHREIA Monthly Meeting
6:30 PM, Wednesday, November 10, 2010

Best Western Executive Court, 13500 South Willow Street, Manchester

Free for members; $20 for non-members
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
